CHAT.comment: VICTOR MOSELEY AND CATHY MOSELEY, DBA VICTOR'S LITTLE SECRET, Petitioner v. V. SECRET CATALOGUE INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES R. HIGGINS, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAWRENCE G. WALLACE ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WALTER E. DELLINGER, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES R. HIGGINS, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:06 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
